column5: shot a tom this morning and i dont tie flies just wondering if any ones would like some feathers
I will take a few off your hands
where do you want them from (part of body)

The St Catharines Game and Fish are accepting wild turkey feathers, wings and tails, at the boat ramp. seems some native dancers are using them for decorating their costumes. http://scgameandfish.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=general&action=display&thread=299
I get the same look when I come home  Thanks for the laugh
Very generous of you Chessy. If I didn't already have a drawer full of turkey feathers I would have gladly accepted some. They're quite popular in many fly patterns.
